item.title: Laravel Setup
item.description: Laravel refs: https://qiita.com/ucan-lab/items/17c806973e69792ada99#docker%E7%92%B0%E5%A2%83%E3%82%92%E6%A7%8B%E7%AF%89%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B spec: nginx mysql phpmyadmin node redis mailhog Setup GitHub Create repogitory on GitHub: laravel Setup WorkDir 1$ mkdir -p work-github/laravel 2$ cd work-github/laravel 3$ echo "# laravel" >> README.md 4$ git init 5$ git add README.md 6$ git commit -m "first commit" 7$ git remote add origin https://github.com/tkondoh1022/laravel.git 8$ git push -u origin master Setup files 1$ tree . 2. 3├── LICENSE 4├── Makefile 5├── README.
